channel.title: Posts on Jay Jones' Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jay Jones' Blog

item.title: Scatter Plots
item.description: I learned how to make scatter plots the other day utilizing the ggplot2 tool. I initially had some issues but quickly remedied the situation. A missing library was one of them, namely being miniUI. In short, it’s an interesting field so far and I may pursue further education in this field.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is my first blog. Short, sweet…most of all simple.

item.title: Jay's Bloggery
item.description: R Markdown You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.:19.0 3rd Qu.: 56.00 ## Max. :25.0 Max. :120.00 fit <- lm(dist ~ speed, data = cars) fit ## ## Call: ## lm(formula = dist ~ speed, data = cars) ## ## Coefficients: ## (Intercept) speed ## -17.
